Eric,

Did you know that the last code example that you show is the design pattern
called Template Method (http://c2.com/cgi-bin/wiki?TemplateMethodPattern)?

When I use Template Method, I mark the method in the super class as final
(in Java), just as you have shown.  Otherwise, the method could be
overridden, taking control away from the super class even though our intent
is to exercise control.

Thanks for sharing your thoughts on using "final."

Craig
